long_description: Light and agile, the Atlas Race snowshoes make it easy to keep running through the snowy months, offering a full-stride-friendly design and aggressive traction so you can push the pace through winter. Lightweight and tough 7075 aluminum frames supply responsive performance; frame shape is optimized to reduce frame clipping, ensure straight tracking and maintain flotation. Spring-Loaded(TM) Suspension (SLS) uses offset webbing straps to create a springy platform beneath the foot that absorbs impact and allows natural side-to-side foot flex. 1-pull LightSpeed Pro bindings cinch tight with a quick tug, supplying a snug, supportive fit that's lightweight and flexible; heel straps secure feet further. Lightweight Nytex(TM) nylon decks are abrasion-resistant and stay flexible when cold and stand up to the elements for lasting use. Ultralight and tough titanium crampons bite into snowy terrain for sure footing and minimal twisting; titanium heel crampons maximize downhill traction and braking. Recommended load specification includes weight of runner with gear; the Atlas Race snowshoes can support up to 220 lbs. on packed trails.
